data.title: Visit Ceraso, Tourism and travel tips
data.meta_description: Are you planning a holiday or a weekend in Ceraso? Are you looking for all main tourist information of Ceraso? Discover on Visit Italy tourist guides and travel experiences.
data.text:
Bay of Silence - Pisciotta

Marina di Pisciotta, Cilento Park

The idea of vacation has a thousand facets as if we wanted to demonstrate once more how the human encyclopedia is rich in a multitude of diversity and unleash different needs. Every holiday is subjective. The same place, the same structure generates in every person who attends it and experiences different sensations. The singularity of the Cilento Park is the one that offers ideas and opportunities for almost every palate. In fact, the richness of the territory and the culture of hospitality, synergistically and magically, present to the tourist a myriad of high quality offers with a common thread that connects them, where the environment, nature, history and humanity become common characteristics.

The Bay of Silence, located in Pisciotta di Palinuro, in addition to these basic elements, has embarked on a road of constant improvement that sees in the amp; rsquo; holistic attention to the person that differentiating aspect. In these cases, the Village also becomes a community where it is nice to be together, socialize and find in relationships that nourishment that often life is too fast everyday. prevents. Imagining different types of people potentially interested in staying in Palinuro at this 4-star resort, we have assumed the questions they might ask and summarily we tried to answer it.

Are you exhausted by long months of uninterrupted work and want to lie in the sun with the only effort to immerse yourself in a wonderful transparent water every now and then? Choose a bungalow among the trees, with blue sea views and a few shades of green and let the Bay of Silence spoil you in cultivating creative idleness with the Slow pace, with tasty local recipes and evening shows in which art and fun play to bring lightness into the silence of the night's rest. Are you hyperactive and can't stay still? The numerous activities of animation, the possibility to learn to practice a new sport or to train in what you already prefer, play table tennis or soccer or take start as a protagonist or spectator at a show they will be able to satisfy your difficulty in staying still.

Do you want to take this opportunity to think of yourself, your body, your inner serenity? Just choose one of the special weeks where you can practice Yoga every day, learn how to massage, use creams to cleanse and nourish the skin and play with hot clay spread all over your body. before you bathe at midnight. Are you curious, art and nature lover? Palinuro is a strategic point for hiking, having available an exceptional guide, passionate about its territory, a deep connoisseur of local traditions. It's just spoilt for choice. With its 180,000 hectares, the Cilento Park by extension is the second Park of Italy.

It is also a World Heritage Site for the quality of life, for integration and balance between Man and the resources of its habitat and for the ability to preserve its traditions. It is included in the prestigious network of Biosphere Reserves of the MAB program. Are you shy and would you like to improve your mood? Throughout the summer you can experience the Yoga of Laughter, attend exhilarating cabarets or even, by participating in a special week, you will be able to acquire comic skills to exercise with family, friends or work colleagues, thanks to the Humor Therapy experts who will teach you the tricks of the trade. Do you like a relaxing pace and a non-chaotic lifestyle?

The holistic team is at your disposal with yoga classes, personal energy rebalancing treatments with shiatzu or sacral skull therapy and you can also enjoy a aperitif at sunset with the Chill out music played by the musician who composed it ad hoc for the Bay of Silence. Now is the time to visit the site, immerse yourself thanks to the photos in the beauty of Cilento and discover among the various activities and among the available residences the one most suitable for the your needs and book now. Yes, because from this year, those who set their holiday period well in advance are rewarded. www.baiadelsilenzio.iterts of Humor Therapy who will teach you the tricks of the trade.

Do you like a relaxing pace and a non-chaotic lifestyle? The holistic team is at your disposal with yoga classes, personal energy rebalancing treatments with shiatzu or sacral skull therapy and you can also enjoy an aperitif at sunset with the Chill out music played by the musician who composed it ad hoc for the Bay of Silence. scritto da John Maxwell - ultima modifica il 21/10/2021

Excursion to the Ridge of the Gods: Ancient Elea of Velia

The Ridge, its name immediately identifies an important part of an elevated and safe path, a hilly ridge of a certain interest, especially when it has been used for centuries by peoples for their travels, trades and why not as then did Domus and Temples for prayers and meditation. An Acropolis built by the Focea colony coming from the coasts of Turkey, extending towards the east, the monumental Porta Rosa, the main entrance of the city and its walls to defend the Site, which rise on the vegetation of the Mediterranean scrub. Built at the end of the 6th century BC before being resumed and strengthened by towers in the Hellenistic age. In fact, in one of the extreme parts stands the Fortilizio di Castelluccio. In the highest areas, a series of terraces, places of worship, for outdoor sanctuaries, called Sacred Terraces (5th century BC). Next to the Acropolis, the Temple of Poseidon Asphaleios used for the cult of gods. A few tens of meters another Hellenistic Temple built between the 3rd century BC and the middle of the second century BC dedicated perhaps to Demeter, the goddess of the fields and harvests or better yet the goddess Mother Earth, but it is said that the cult was for Elea mythological figure. Instead, an imposing square is intended for public meetings, where Cippi dedicated to Zeus (5th century BC) are also found. Then follow the Hellenic Sanctuary Parmenides and Zenon founders of the presocratic philosophical school active in Elea. Archaeological site located in Ascea and Casal Velino, visited every year by thousands of tourists from all over the world, but still today a destination for many scholars and philosophers who come from all over to study the life of Parmenides and Zenon. The remains of Velia are always open to everyone, children do not pay, discounts for students. The best time to visit the site is undoubtedly spring and autumn. You can get there by land by car or even comfortably by train (train station 1 km away).

scritto da Sheila Pickles - ultima modifica il 21/10/2021
